p: Most patients (63.2%, 203/321) had cardiac injury. Information detailing cardiac injury diagnosis is shown in Table 1 . Among the 203 patients with cardiac injury, 128 patients had at least two kinds of evidence of cardiac injury. The proportions of heart failure were 34.6% (111/321), followed by myocarditis 1.9%, sudden cardiac arrest 2.8%, and cardiogenic shock 1.2%.
